Trigger.name: Primary Prompt
Trigger.script:
if not snd.channeling then cecho(" <red>[<white>" .. snd.target .. "<red>]") if not snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid on") end if snd.offense_loaded then local msg snd.battle_aff = "none" snd.chasten_aff = "none" snd.last_cured = "" snd.rebounded = false snd.run_alerts() if #snd.alertness >= 1 and snd.toggles.affcalling then dir = snd.parseDir(snd.alertnessDir) msg = "wt [" .. string.upper(snd.alertType) .. "] -" .. string.upper(dir) .. "- " for i in pairs(snd.alertness) do msg = msg .. snd.alertness[i] .. " " end snd.send(msg) end snd.alertness = {} snd.alertnessDir = "none" end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.maybe_affs = {} snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.defended = false disableTrigger("Sunder Dodge") disableTrigger("Sunder Parry") disableTrigger("Sunder Rebounding") snd.core()
if snd.delete_prompt then deleteLine() snd.delete_prompt = false end
if snd.bashing_loaded then if snd.new.area then if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the Shattered Vortex" then x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") level = tonumber(x) if level < 100 then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Low Level)" elseif snd.faction == "spirit" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Spirit)" elseif snd.faction == "shadow" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Shadow)" end if area ~= snd.my.area then cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. area) snd.load_targets(area) send(" ") end else cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. gmcp.Room.Info.area) snd.load_targets(gmcp.Room.Info.area) send(" ") end snd.new.area = false end
if snd.new.room and snd.toggles.fasthunt then snd.ylem_check = false if bot.going and (snd.pathing or speedWalkCounter ~= 0) then return end
if snd.toggles.fasthunt and snd.are_we_with_grouped() then snd.toggles.bashing = true snd.waiting.balance = false snd.room_clear = true snd.runBasher() snd.core() elseif bot.going then expandAlias("move") end --send("who here", false) end end
snd.new.room = false
if snd.gui.enabled then local tally_check = snd.aff_tally() if tally_check > 0 then display_my_affs() else myaffs:echo("<center>" .. "my affs" .. "</center>") end end
if not snd.have_aff("recklessness") and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then snd.percentesthealth = gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp snd.percentestmana = gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp snd.lasthealth = gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp snd.lastmana = gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp end
local healthchangeval = 0
if gmcp.Char.Vitals ~= nil then healthchangeval = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) - tonumber(snd.lasthealth)) if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if tonumber(healthchangeval) ~= "0" then if tonumber(snd.lasthealth) > tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<red>\[\- " ..healthchangeval.. " \-\]") elseif tonumber(snd.lasthealth) < tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<cyan>\[\+ " ..healthchangeval.. " +\]") end end end snd.percenthealth = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) snd.percenthealth = roundDown(snd.percenthealth,0) snd.percentmana = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) * 100) snd.percentmana = roundDown(snd.percentmana,0) end
if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end
snd.stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.stance snd.firstaidsalve()
if snd.have_aff("asleep") and not snd.waking and not snd.have_aff("stun") and not snd.have_aff("unconscious") then send("qeb wake") send("qeb wake") snd.waking = true if waketimer_timer then killTimer(waketimer_timer) end waketimer_timer = tempTimer(3.0,[[if snd.have_aff("asleep") then snd.waking = false end]]) end
if not snd.have_aff("stun") and not snd.have_aff("unconscious") and not snd.have_aff("asleep") then if snd.have_aff("fallen") and snd.restand and snd.equilibrium then if not snd.writheaffflag and not snd.have_aff("paralysis") and (not snd.have_aff("right_leg_damaged") or not snd.have_aff("left_leg_damaged")) and not snd.have_aff("right_leg_broken") and not snd.have_aff("left_leg_broken") and not snd.have_aff("frozen") then if snd.class == "Monk" then if not snd.kipup then snd.send("qeb kipup") snd.kipup = true end end if not snd.firstaid then snd.send("qeb stand") snd.restand = false if restandtimer_timer then killTimer(restandtimer_timer) end restandtimer_timer = tempTimer(2,[[snd.restand = true]]) end end end end
if snd.nextcurecheck and snd.endgameuse ~= "none" and not snd.firstaid then
if #snd.aff_list > 2 and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 60 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 60 and not snd.tree and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 60 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 60 and not snd.herbalance and (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and not snd.tree and snd.class_hitting ~= "luminary" and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and not snd.herbalance and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 39 and snd.class_hitting ~= "luminary" and (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and (snd.have_aff("crippled_body") or snd.have_aff("crippled")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif snd.endgamequeue and #snd.aff_list < 3 then snd.send("queue renew") end
end
snd.staonenonbal()
if #snd.aff_list > 0 and not snd.firstaid then snd.mastercheck() end
snd.staone()
--snd.sipfunction()
if snd.moss and not snd.firstaid then if tonumber(snd.percenthealth) < 75 or tonumber(snd.percentmana) < 75 or snd.have_aff("plodding") or snd.have_aff("idiocy") and not snd.firstaid then if not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and not snd.have_aff("stun") then snd.eatmoss() end elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") or snd.have_aff("blackout") then if not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and not snd.have_aff("stun") then snd.eatmoss() end end end
if snd.clottime and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bleeding) > 30 and not (snd.have_aff("haemophilia") or snd.have_aff("stun")) then snd.clotcheck() snd.clottime = false if reclottimer_timer then killTimer(reclottimer_timer) end reclottimer_timer = tempTimer(1,[[snd.clottime = true]]) end
if #snd.aff_list == 0 then snd.herbaffflag = false snd.salveaffflag = false snd.pipeaffflag = false snd.writheaffflag = false return false end
else cecho("\n<cyan>SYSTEM IS PAUSED, SYSTEM IS PAUSED, USE <red>SNDON<cyan> TO UNPAUSE") if snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid off") end end

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: def start
Trigger.script: for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do snd.def_remove(i) end snd.parrying = "head"

regexCodeList.string: You have the following active defences:

Trigger.name: def end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("def start", 0)

regexCodeList.string: ^You are protected by (\d+) defences\.$

Trigger.script: snd.def_def("gripping")

regexCodeList.string: Your hands are gripping your wielded items tightly.

You concentrate on gripping tightly with your hands.
You have gained the gripping defence.

local possible_skills = { "Selfishness", "Chameleon", "Gripping", "Nightsight", "Stalking", "Heatsight", "Pacing", }

Trigger.name: affline got

regexCodeList.string: ^You are afflicted with (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: affline cure
Trigger.script:
if snd.gui.enabled then deleteLine() end snd.aff_cure(matches[2]) if matches[2] == "left_arm_broken" or matches[2] == "right_arm_broken" then snd.aff_cure("broken_arm") end if matches[2] == "left_leg_broken" or matches[2] == "right_leg_broken" then snd.aff_cure("broken_leg") end
local multiaffliction = matches[2] snd.passfunction = matches[2]
if not table.isMember(snd.have_aff, matches[2]) and matches[2] ~= "stun" and matches[2] ~= "vitalbane" then snd.unknownquantity = snd.unknownquantity - 1 if tonumber(snd.unknownquantity) < 1 then snd.aff_cure("unknown") snd.unknownquantity = 0 end end
if "writhe_grappled" == multiaffliction then snd.statusrecovery = true end
if multiaffliction == "blackout" then snd.healretry = false snd.send("qeb concentrate") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end
elseif multiaffliction == "confusion" then snd.send("qeb concentrate") elseif multiaffliction == "disfigurement" then snd.statusrecovery = true snd.setpassive = true elseif multiaffliction == "asthma" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end
elseif multiaffliction == "impatience" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end
elseif (multiaffliction == "stupidity" or multiaffliction == "aeon") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end snd.stunrecheck = false snd.send("qeb concentrate"..snd.sep.."drink health")
elseif multiaffliction == "right_leg_broken" then snd.send("stand") elseif multiaffliction == "left_leg_broken" then snd.send("stand") elseif multiaffliction == "vinethorns" then snd.vinethornpulling = false elseif multiaffliction == "glom" then snd.firstaidchangecure = true
end
if snd.sync then snd.statusrecovery = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have cured (.*).$

Trigger.name: arms
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("broken_arm")

regexCodeList.string: A serpentine blademistress spits onto her scimitar before slicing into you, and your arm wastes away beneath burning venom.
Blood floats up through the water as a blackened, ravenous shark seizes your arm in its maw, nearly tearing it from your body and snapping bones in the process.
The crone strokes your arm, withering it into uselessness.
^Before you can avoid it, \w+'s? hand brushes against your arm and it withers away\.$

Trigger.name: legs
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("broken_leg")

regexCodeList.string: A tattered Bahkatu experiment tears into your knee with his rabid maw, snapping the bone easily beneath such immense pressure.
A giant, rabid Syll seizes your leg in an iron grip, nearly pulling it clean from the socket.
A chimera's black lion head seizes your leg in its grip, wrenching it painfully from its socket as it tosses you to the ground.
A sharp-toothed gremlin's eyes gleam as it slams its head into your knee, shattering it and knocking you off-balance.
^(\w+) reaches out and grabs your leg, which almost gives way underneath you as it shrivels feebly away\.$
You stumble slightly as your left leg shrivels into a useless appendage.
You slowly hobble

Trigger.name: got adder
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("adder_tarot") --snd.send("qeb rip card from body")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ dips the Adder tarot in venom then flings it at you\. It hooks viciously into your? flesh, a small trail of blood dripping from where it pierced the skin\.$

Trigger.name: cure adder
Trigger.script: snd.aff_cure("adder_tarot")

regexCodeList.string: You rip the Adder tarot from your body, the sharp fangs tearing your flesh.

Trigger.name: Setting priority - firstaid
Trigger.script: snd.firstaidcuretrack[matches[2]] = matches[3] local first = matches[2] local second = matches[3] snd.firstaidtrack = first.." "..second if snd.firstaidtrack == snd.setting_priority then snd.counttimes = snd.counttimes + 1 if snd.counttimes > 3 then snd.update_priority = 0 disableTimer("reset check") snd.counttimes = 0 end end if snd.update_priority > 0 then enableTimer("reset check") snd.firstaidresetlistnone() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have set the \'(.*)\' affliction to the (\d+) priority.$

Trigger.name: Firstaid priority pre-restore
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "torso" then snd.firstaidcuretrack[matches[2]] = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.pretorso = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "head" then snd.firstaidcuretrack[matches[2]] = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.prehead = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "left leg" then snd.firstaidcuretrack.leftleg = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.preleftleg = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "right leg" then snd.firstaidcuretrack.rightleg = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.prerightleg = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "left arm" then snd.firstaidcuretrack.leftarm = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.preleftarm = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "right arm" then snd.firstaidcuretrack.rightarm = matches[4] snd.firstaidcuretrack.prerightarm = matches[3] end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have set the priority on pre\-restoring your (.*) when it's above (\d+)\% damage to (\d+).$

Trigger.name: diag start
Trigger.script:
for i in pairs(snd.afflictions) do snd.aff_remove(i) end
snd.unknownquantity = 0 snd.aff_remove("unknown") snd.diag_sent = true tempTimer(1, [[snd.diag_sent = false]])
if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end end

regexCodeList.string: You are:

Trigger.name: diag end

Trigger.name: got limb damage
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.atkecho and snd.gui.enabled then deleteLine() end snd.limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]] = snd.limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]]+tonumber(multimatches[2][3])
if limb == "left leg" then snd.lleghit = snd.lleghit + 1
elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.rleghit = snd.rleghit + 1
elseif limb == "torso" then snd.torsohit = snd.torsohit + 1
elseif limb == "head" then snd.headhit = snd.headhit + 1
elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.larmhit = snd.larmhit + 1
elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.rarmhit = snd.rarmhit + 1
end snd.parry() snd.firstaidsalve()

Trigger.name: wounds start
Trigger.script: snd.limblist_leftleg = 0 snd.limblist_rightleg = 0 snd.limblist_rightarm = 0 snd.limblist_leftarm = 0 snd.limblist_torso = 0 snd.limblist_head = 0

regexCodeList.string: You take a moment to assess how damaged your limbs are:

Trigger.name: wounds line
Trigger.script:
snd.limb_damage[string.lower(matches[2])] = tonumber(matches[3])
if string.lower(matches[2]) == "head" then snd.limblist_head = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_head) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_head) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("headprerestore") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "torso" then snd.limblist_torso = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_torso) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_torso) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("torsoprerestore") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "left arm" then snd.limblist_leftarm = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_leftarm) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_leftarm) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("leftarmprerestore") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "left leg" then snd.limblist_leftleg = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_leftleg) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_leftleg) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("leftlegprerestore") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "right arm" then snd.limblist_rightarm = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_rightarm) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_rightarm) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("rightarmprerestore") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "right leg" then snd.limblist_rightleg = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist_rightleg) > 6 then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist_rightleg) < 1 then snd.aff_remove("rightlegprerestore") end end

Trigger.name: wounds end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("wounds start", 0)

Trigger.name: Restoration application
Trigger.script:
local limb = matches[2] snd.salveretry = false snd.salvebal = false if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end end
if limb == "left leg" then snd.lleghit = "0" elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.rleghit = "0" elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.larmhit = "0" elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.rarmhit = "0" elseif limb == "head" then snd.headhit = "0" elseif limb == "torso" then snd.torsohit = "0" end
if snd.sync and gmcp.Char.Vitals.prone == "1" and snd.balances.regenerate then snd.send("qeb regenerate") elseif snd.sync and not snd.can_arms() and snd.balances.regenerate then snd.send("qeb regenerate") end

Trigger.name: Aeon cured
Trigger.script: snd.aff_remove("aeon") snd.healretry = false if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if not snd.toggles.active then expandAlias("sndon") end end snd.respeed = false

Trigger.name: Limb taking damage
Trigger.script:
local limb = matches[2] local damage = matches[3]
snd.parry.heelrush = "none"
if limb == "left leg" then snd.lleghit = snd.lleghit + 1 snd.limblist_leftleg = snd.limblist_leftleg + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL LEFT LEG DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_leftleg)
elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.rleghit = snd.rleghit + 1 snd.limblist_rightleg = snd.limblist_rightleg + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL RIGHT LEG DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_rightleg)
elseif limb == "torso" then snd.torsohit = snd.torsohit + 1 snd.limblist_torso = snd.limblist_torso + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL TORSO DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_torso)
elseif limb == "head" then snd.headhit = snd.headhit + 1 snd.limblist_head = snd.limblist_head + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL HEAD DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_head)
elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.larmhit = snd.larmhit + 1 snd.limblist_leftarm = snd.limblist_leftarm + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL LEFT ARM DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_leftarm)
elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.rarmhit = snd.rarmhit + 1 snd.limblist_rightarm = snd.limblist_rightarm + damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL RIGHT ARM DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_rightarm)
end snd.parry() snd.firstaidsalve()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your (.*) has taken (.*)\% damage.$

Trigger.name: Pendulum on you
Trigger.script:
local changeleftarm = 0 local changeleftleg = 0 local changerightarm = 0 local changerightleg = 0
if matches[2] == "clockwise" then if snd.limb_damage["right arm"] > 0 then changerightleg = snd.limb_damage["right arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["right leg"] > 0 then changeleftleg = snd.limb_damage["right leg"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left arm"] > 0 then changerightarm = snd.limb_damage["left arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left leg"] > 0 then changeleftarm = snd.limb_damage["left leg"] end if changerightleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = changerightleg snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = 0 elseif changeleftleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = changeleftleg snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = 0 elseif changerightarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = changerightarm snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = 0 elseif changeleftarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = changeleftarm snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = 0 end elseif matches[2] == "anti-clockwise" then if snd.limb_damage["right arm"] > 0 then changeleftarm = snd.limb_damage["right arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["right leg"] > 0 then changerightarm = snd.limb_damage["right leg"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left arm"] > 0 then changeleftleg = snd.limb_damage["left arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left leg"] > 0 then changerightleg = snd.limb_damage["left leg"] end if changeleftarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = changeleftarm snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = 0 elseif changerightarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = changerightarm snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = 0 elseif changeleftleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = changeleftleg snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = 0 elseif changerightleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = changerightleg snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = 0 end end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses Purification Pendulum ((\w+)) on you.$

Trigger.name: Limb Damage Restored
Trigger.script: local limb = matches[2] if limb == "left leg" then snd.aff_remove("leftlegprerestore") snd.aff_remove("left_leg_amputated") snd.aff_remove("left_leg_mangled") snd.aff_remove("left_leg_damaged") snd.limblist_leftleg = 0 elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.aff_remove("rightlegprerestore") snd.aff_remove("right_leg_amputated") snd.aff_remove("right_leg_mangled") snd.aff_remove("right_leg_damaged") snd.limblist_rightleg = 0 elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.aff_remove("leftarmprerestore") snd.aff_remove("left_arm_amputated") snd.aff_remove("left_arm_mangled") snd.aff_remove("left_arm_damaged") snd.limblist_leftarm = 0 elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.aff_remove("right_arm_mangled") snd.aff_remove("right_arm_damaged") snd.aff_remove("right_arm_amputated") snd.aff_remove("rightarmprerestore") snd.limblist_rightarm = 0 elseif limb == "torso" then snd.limblist_torso = 0 snd.aff_remove("torsoprerestore") snd.aff_remove("crushed_chest") snd.aff_remove("spinal_rip") snd.aff_remove("torso_mangled") snd.aff_remove("torso_damaged") elseif limb == "head" then snd.limblist_head = 0 snd.aff_remove("headprerestore") snd.aff_remove("head_mangled") snd.aff_remove("head_damaged") snd.aff_remove("smashed_throat") snd.aff_remove("mauled_face") end snd.parry() snd.firstaidsalve()

regexCodeList.string: ^You have restored your (.*) as best as you can!$

Trigger.name: Limb damage recovered
Trigger.script:
local limb = matches[2] local damage = matches[3] if limb == "left leg" then snd.limblist_leftleg = snd.limblist_leftleg - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL LEFT LEG DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_leftleg) elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.limblist_rightleg = snd.limblist_rightleg - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL RIGHT LEG DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_rightleg) elseif limb == "torso" then snd.limblist_torso = snd.limblist_torso - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL TORSO DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_torso) elseif limb == "head" then snd.limblist_head = snd.limblist_head - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL HEAD DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_head) elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.limblist_leftarm = snd.limblist_leftarm - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL LEFT ARM DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_leftarm) elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.limblist_rightarm = snd.limblist_rightarm - damage cecho("<cyan> TOTAL RIGHT ARM DAMAGE: <red>" ..snd.limblist_rightarm) end
snd.firstaidsalve()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your (.*) has recovered (\d+)\% damage.$

Trigger.name: Bruising cure

local limb = matches[2]
if limb == "head" then snd.aff_remove("head_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("head_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("head_bruised") elseif limb == "left leg" then snd.aff_remove("left_leg_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("left_leg_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("left_leg_bruised") elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.aff_remove("right_leg_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("right_leg_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("right_leg_bruised") elseif limb == "torso" then snd.aff_remove("torso_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("torso_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("torso_bruised") elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.aff_remove("right_arm_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("right_arm_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("right_arm_bruised") elseif matches[2] == "left arm" then snd.aff_remove("left_arm_bruised_critical") snd.aff_remove("left_arm_bruised_moderate") snd.aff_remove("left_arm_bruised") end

Trigger.name: login
Trigger.script:
sendGMCP([[Core.Supports.Add ["Comm.Channel 1", "IRE.Time 1"] ]]) -- allows us to use GMCP for communication and time tracking snd.pipes_lit = false
snd.updateToggles()
send("config separator", false) enableTrigger("Separator Check/Update") send("config affliction_view full", false) send("config simple_diag on", false) send("config pagelength 250", false) send("config grabcorpses on", false) send("config viewtitles off", false) send("config curemsgs default", false) send("config combatmessages on", false) send("config fishnumbers on", false) send("config autodoors on", false) send("Config Ansi ON", false) send("Config mxp on", false) send("config simpletargeting on", false) send("config dialogue on", false) send("config prettynumbers off", false) send("config color deathsight 11 1", false) -- this is if you want deathsight to actually go to the UI window for tracking send("config color shouts 4 6", false) disableTimer("Stayconnected") snd.diag_sent = false disableTimer("Firstaidstatustimer") snd.firstaidstart()
snd.class = gmcp.Char.Status.class snd.spectype = gmcp.Char.Status.spec snd.city = gmcp.Char.Status.city
if snd.class == "Ascendril" then send("simultaneity") end if snd.class == "Sciomancer" then send("channel shadow") end if snd.class == "Archivist" then send("empower jhako") end
tempTimer(1, [[if snd.gui.enabled then time_update() end]]) tempTimer(2.5, [[ snd.changeClass(); if snd.skills ~= {} then snd.skills = {} snd.skills.tattoos_on_me = {} snd.skills.raceskills = {} end send("ab")]]) tempTimer(3, [[populate_skills()]]) tempTimer(4, [[send("tattoos", false)]])
local x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") local level = tonumber(x) if level >= 99 then tempTimer(5, [[send("raceskill list", false)]]) end
--tempTimer(10, [[if not sndNDB.highlightNames then expandAlias("sndb hl") end]])
snd.cohoshtype = "cohosh" snd.salvapplytype = "apply" snd.wheretype = "to" snd.restotype = "restoration" snd.mendingtype = "mending" snd.calorictype = "caloric" snd.epidermaltype = "epidermal" snd.masstype = "mass"
if gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Yeleni" then snd.endgamedef = "warmth" snd.endgamehealth = "serenity" snd.endgameuse = "renew"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Azudim" then snd.endgamedef = "miasma" snd.endgamehealth = "shift" snd.endgameuse = "RECONSTITUTE"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Tekal" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none" snd.endgameuse = "none"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "safeguard" snd.endgamehealth = "pulse" snd.endgameuse = "erase"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Ankyrean" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Azudim" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Yeleni" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none" snd.endgameuse = "none" end

Trigger.name: ih end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("ih start", 0) snd.have_items = true if #snd.gathering > 0 then snd.need_loot = true end snd.waiting.ih = false snd.waiting.balance = false if snd.bashing.targeted and snd.toggles.calling then if not snd.last_target then snd.last_target = snd.bashing.target end -- if snd.bashing.target ~= snd.last_target then -- snd.send("wt Target: "..snd.bashing.target) -- snd.last_target = snd.bashing.target -- end end if not snd.bashing.targeted then if snd.toggles.bashing then snd.toggle("bashing") end if bot.going then expandAlias("move", false) -- tempTimer(1.5, [[expandAlias("move")]]) end snd.core() end

Trigger.name: ih aggro
Trigger.script: snd.bashing.target_word = multimatches[2][2] snd.bashing.target_number = multimatches[2][3] snd.bashing.target_desc = multimatches[2][4] if (snd.bashing.target_priority ~= 200 or not snd.bashing.targeted) and not table.contains(snd.possible_targets, snd.bashing.target_desc) then snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_number if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt target: "..snd.bashing.target) end snd.bashing.target_priority = 200 snd.bashing.targeted = true end

regexCodeList.string: FG3BG2

Trigger.name: ih line
Trigger.script:
snd.bashing.target_word = matches[2] snd.bashing.target_number = matches[3] snd.bashing.target_desc = matches[4] for i in ipairs(snd.possible_targets) do if ((snd.bashing.target_type == "long") and string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.possible_targets[i])) or ((snd.bashing.target_type == "short") and string.find(snd.bashing.target_word, snd.possible_targets[i])) then if not string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, "the corpse of") then if not snd.bashing.targeted then if snd.toggles.generics then snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_word else snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_number end if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt target: "..snd.bashing.target) end snd.bashing.targeted = true snd.bashing.target_priority = i elseif i < snd.bashing.target_priority then if snd.toggles.generics then snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_word else snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_number end if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt target: "..snd.bashing.target) end snd.bashing.target_priority = i snd.bashing.targeted = true end end end end
if snd.possible_items ~= {} then for k in ipairs(snd.possible_items) do if string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.possible_items[k]) then snd.item_found = false for v in ipairs(snd.gathering) do if snd.gathering[v] == snd.bashing.target_number then snd.item_found = true end end if not snd.item_found then table.insert(snd.gathering, snd.bashing.target_number) end end end end
for y in ipairs(snd.global_items) do if string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.global_items[y]) then snd.item_found = false for z in ipairs(snd.gathering) do if snd.gathering[z] == snd.bashing.target_number then snd.item_found = true end end if not snd.item_found then table.insert(snd.gathering, snd.bashing.target_number) end end end

Trigger.name: deathblow
Trigger.script: if snd.gui.enabled then deleteLine() end snd.message("DEATH: "..matches[2], "death") if snd.bashcounterattack then snd.bashcounterattack = false end if snd.punisher then snd.punisher = false end if snd.probed then snd.probed = false end if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "The Forgotten Mausoleum" then expandAlias("aa") else enableTimer("looktimer") snd.untarget() end

regexCodeList.string: ^The final blow proves too much for (.+), who expires, pitifully\.$
^(.+) pales and then fall to the ground, a look of surprise etched on (?:the )?\w+ face\.$
^(.+) gives a last, feeble gasp as (?:the )?\w+ windpipe is crushed\.$
^(.+) stiffens and drops dead as the venom proves too much for (?:the )?\w+ system\.$
^With so much force behind the final blow, (.+) expires in a brutalized mess\.$
^The mighty blow utterly destroys (.+), splitting (?:the )?\w+ apart messily\.$
^Having slain (.+), you retrieve the corpse.$

<red>****************************************") cecho("
<red> NEXT ROOM PLEASE YAY ") cecho("
<red>****************************************") if snd.vermin_on then if bot.going then tempTimer(1.5, [[expandAlias("move")]]) end disableTimer("moveroom") end end

Trigger.name: exp trigger
Trigger.script:
snd.stats.max_xp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxxp)
snd.stats.last_xp = string.gsub(matches[2],",","") snd.stats.last_xp = tonumber(snd.stats.last_xp)
snd.stats.xp = string.gsub(matches[4],",","") snd.stats.xp = tonumber(snd.stats.xp)
if snd.gui.enabled then local mobs_to_level = (snd.stats.max_xp - snd.stats.xp) / snd.stats.last_xp local mobs_xp_percent = (tonumber(snd.stats.last_xp) / snd.stats.max_xp) * 100 local xp_point_percent = (25 - (((snd.stats.xp / snd.stats.max_xp) * 100) % 25)) local mobs_to_point = xp_point_percent / mobs_xp_percent
deleteLine() snd.message("<red>Experience Gained<white>: " .. matches[2] .. " - from " .. matches[3] .. ". Total: " .. matches[4] .. ".") snd.message("<white>"..(snd.stats.max_xp - snd.stats.xp).."<yellow>xp [<white>"..round(mobs_to_level,0).."<yellow>] to level!")
local x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") local level = tonumber(x) if level > 99 then snd.message("<white>"..round(((xp_point_percent/100)*snd.stats.max_xp), 0).."<yellow>xp [<white>"..round(mobs_to_point,0).."<yellow>] to haven point!") end end

end

Trigger.name: generic capture
Trigger.script:
local secondary_capture_needed = {"A needling horncall airs a whining note, prefacing some grand announcement."} local ignores = {"The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently",}
if snd.gui.enabled then
for _, ignore in ipairs(ignores) do if matches[1]:find(ignore) then return false end end
if snd.last_channel == "Web" then if matches[1]:find("Web") then demonnic.chat:append("Web") disableTrigger("generic capture") end elseif string.find(matches[1]:lower(), snd.who_is_talking:lower()) or snd.who_is_talking == gmcp.Char.Status.name then demonnic.chat:append(snd.last_channel or "Misc") disableTrigger("generic capture") elseif snd.we_saw_a_thot then demonnic.chat:append("Local") snd.we_saw_a_thot = false disableTrigger("generic capture") elseif snd.last_channel == "Tells" then demonnic.chat:append("Tells") disableTrigger("generic capture") end
end
if table.isMember(secondary_capture_needed, matches[1]) then enableTrigger("secondary capture") end

disableTrigger("secondary capture")

Trigger.name: Crush part 1
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
snd.last_limb_dmg = 2.5 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"}) snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = snd.last_hit_limb end

regexCodeList.string: ^With careful aim \w+ smashe?s? .+ mace into (\w+)'s .+\.$

Trigger.name: Crush part 2
Trigger.script:
if snd.getting_hit == snd.target then local amount = 2.5 --buckler is 2.5 if matches[1]:find("tower") then amount = 12.5 elseif matches[1]:find("kite") then amount = 10 end snd.last_limb_dmg = amount snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"})
--We also need to add the difference to the first attack. Since you don't know what shield they're using until part 2, it's a little wonky. if amount > 2.5 then -- already good if it's buckler snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.luminary_crush_first_choice, amount-2.5) -- add the amount minus what we've already given snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil end end disableTrigger("Luminary Crush Confirmation")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ swiftly follows? up by slamming .+ into \w+ .+\.$

Trigger.name: Monk Hit Tracking
Trigger.script:
-- Only adding limb damage if we see the hit connect message. if snd.target == snd.getting_hit then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg)
if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then local aff = snd.maybe_affs[1] if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) table.insert(snd.last_affs, aff) end end
end
disableTrigger("Monk Hit Tracking")

Trigger.name: Wrench confirmation hit
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if matches[1]:find("calmly wrench") then if snd.checkAff(snd.affNameCheck(matches[3].."_broken")) then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7 else snd.last_limb_dmg = 14 end snd.last_hit_limb = matches[3] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) enableTrigger("Sunder Parry") else snd.target_got("whiplash") snd.target_got("smashed_throat") snd.target_got("crippled_throat") end end
disableTrigger("Wrench confirmation hit")

Trigger.name: Sunder Parry
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then if snd.last_affs[1] == "blaze" then snd.used.rebounding = true else for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end end
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.parried_limb = snd.last_hit_limb snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil
end
disableTrigger("Sunder Parry")

if matches[2] == snd.target then if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[4]~= "head" and matches[4] ~= "torso" then snd.target_got(matches[4].." broken") end snd.message("<red>"..matches[2]..matches[3].." <white>"..matches[4].." was broken!")

Trigger.name: mending
Trigger.script: if matches[2]:lower() == snd.target:lower() then snd.target_last_used_salve = "mending" if not snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then if snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] = snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising "..matches[4]) elseif snd.checkAff("destroyed_throat") then snd.target_cured("destroyed_throat") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "destroyed_throat") elseif snd.checkAff("crippled_throat") and matches[4] == "head" then snd.target_cured("crippled_throat") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "crippled_throat") elseif snd.checkAff("lightwound") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("lightwound") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "lightwound") elseif snd.checkAff("ablaze") and (matches[4] == "torso" or matches[4] == "skin") and not snd.checkAff("heatspear") then snd.target_cured("ablaze") snd.target_cured("crispy") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "ablaze") elseif snd.checkAff(matches[4].."_broken") then snd.target_cured(matches[4].."_broken") table.insert(snd.last_affs, matches[4]:gsub(" ", "_").."_broken") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken arm") and matches[4]:find("arm") then snd.target_cured("a broken arm") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "a broken arm") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken leg") and matches[4]:find ("leg") then snd.target_cured("a broken leg") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "a broken leg") elseif matches[4] == "torso" and snd.checkAff("cracked_ribs") then snd.target_cured("cracked_ribs") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "cracked_ribs") elseif matches[4] == "legs" then if snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["left leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left leg") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["right leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right leg") elseif snd.checkAff("left_leg_broken") then snd.target_cured("left_leg_broken") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "left_leg_broken") elseif snd.checkAff("right_leg_broken") then snd.target_cured("right_leg_broken") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "right_leg_broken") elseif snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] >= 2 then snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["left leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left leg") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] >= 2 then snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["right leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right leg") elseif snd.checkAff("cracked_kneecaps") then snd.target_cured("cracked_kneecaps") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "cracked_kneecaps") elseif snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising["left leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["left leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left leg") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising["right leg"] = snd.limb_bruising["right leg"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right leg") elseif snd.checkAff("left_leg_dislocated") then snd.target_cured("left_leg_dislocated") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "left_leg_dislocated") elseif snd.checkAff("right_leg_dislocated") then snd.target_cured("right_leg_dislocated") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "right_leg_dislocated") end elseif matches[4] == "arms" then if snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["left arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left arm") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["right arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right arm") elseif snd.checkAff("left_arm_broken") then snd.target_cured("left_arm_broken") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "left_arm_broken") elseif snd.checkAff("right_arm_broken") then snd.target_cured("right_arm_broken") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "right_arm_broken") elseif snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] >= 2 then snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["left arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left arm") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] >= 2 then snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["right arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right arm") elseif snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising["left arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["left arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising left arm") elseif snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising["right arm"] = snd.limb_bruising["right arm"]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising right arm") elseif snd.checkAff("left_arm_dislocated") then snd.target_cured("left_arm_dislocated") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "left_arm_dislocated") elseif snd.checkAff("right_arm_dislocated") then snd.target_cured("right_arm_dislocated") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "right_arm_dislocated") end elseif snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] = snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]]-1 table.insert(snd.last_affs, "bruising "..matches[4]) elseif snd.checkAff(matches[4].." dislocated") then snd.target_cured(matches[4].." dislocated") table.insert(snd.last_affs, matches[4].." dislocated") end end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.gui.enabled then deleteFull() end if snd.class == "Zealot" then if snd.flamestack == 12 then snd.immolation_ready = true else snd.immolation_ready = false end cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a mending poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|legs|arms), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

Trigger.name: restoration
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_last_used_salve = "restoration" snd.resto_limb = matches[4] snd.enemy_used_regenerate = false if restoration_timer then killTimer(restoration_timer) end snd.current_restoration_aff = "" local aff_restoration_timer = true
if snd.resto_limb == "torso" then if snd.checkAff("collapsed_lung") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "collapsed_lung" elseif snd.checkAff("spinal_rip") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "spinal_rip" elseif snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "burnt_skin" elseif snd.checkAff("crushed_chest") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "crushed_chest" elseif snd.checkAff("heatspear") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "heatspear" elseif snd.checkAff("deepwound") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "deepwound" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end elseif snd.resto_limb == "head" then if snd.checkAff("mauled_face") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "mauled_face" elseif snd.checkAff("smashed_throat") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "smashed_throat" elseif snd.checkAff("voidgaze") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "voidgaze" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end --All limbs don't have special resto affs, so just remove the damage accrued. else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end
if aff_restoration_timer then restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8,[[snd.target_cured(snd.current_restoration_aff)]]) end snd.enemy_restoration_balance = false tempTimer(3,[[snd.enemy_restoration_balance = true]])
end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a restoration poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

deleteLine() snd.message("You: start consumption.", "atk")
end swarms = 0

As the stone activates, it glows an eerie red, floating from your palm to above your head, covering everything in the vicinity with its repulsive light.

Trigger.name: scent end
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("scent", 0)
if snd.toggles.calling then local string = ""
for i in pairs(snd.scented) do x = mmp.searchRoomExact(i) for y in pairs(x) do z = y end list = "" for j in pairs(snd.scented[i]) do list = list .. " " .. snd.scented[i][j] end if i ~= snd.my.room_name then string = "wt " .. i .. " (" .. z .. "): " .. list .. snd.sep end end
if string ~= "" then snd.send(string) end snd.scented = {} end

if snd.gui.enabled then deleteLine() snd.message(matches[2].."has a prismatic barrier!") end
if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.class == "Carnifex" then snd.send("qeb soul erode "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Shaman" then snd.send("qeb commune leafstorm "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Luminary" then snd.send("qeb perform force "..matches[2].." kick "..gmcp.Char.Status.name) elseif hasSkill("HourglassTattoo") then snd.send("qeb touch hourglass "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Templar" then snd.send("qeb aura withering "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Revenant" then snd.send("qeb phantasm parasite "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Warden" then snd.send("qeb ancest carve "..matches[2]) else snd.send("wt "..matches[2].." has a barrier!") snd.get_new_target() end end tempTimer(snd.delay(), [[enableTrigger("prismatic barrier")]]) disableTrigger("prismatic barrier")

Trigger.name: Target not in room
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.bashing then snd.no_target() end snd.target_gone = true
if not snd.toggles.calling then return end
local who = matches[2]:title()
if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) then table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) send("ql") end
if who:lower() ~= "eld" and who == snd.target:title() then snd.no_target() end
enableTimer("looktimer")

Trigger.name: aegis/prismatic on target
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
local who = matches[2]:title()
local count = 1
if table.contains(snd.targeting.list, who) then local pos = table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) or nil for k, v in ipairs(snd.targeting.list) do if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) and table.contains(snd.players_here, v) and k > table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) then expandAlias("t " .. v) break end end else table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) snd.get_new_target() end
end

Trigger.name: Fishing Line Prompt (for deciding to cut/lead/reel)
Trigger.script:
if currently_fishing and fish_update then
fish_update = false
local linestrength = matches[2] local fishstrength = matches[3] local distance = matches[4]
if tonumber(linestrength) >= 95 and tonumber(distance) >= 10 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 90 and tonumber(distance) >= 30 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 7 and tonumber(distance) >= 0 then send("qeb fishing reel", false) elseif tonumber(fishstrength) >= 20 then send("qeb fishing lead", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) <= 100 then send("qeb fishing reel", false)
end
end
deleteFull()

Trigger.name: CaptureFishingHole
Trigger.script:
-- Make sure tables actually exist. if not fishing_holes then load_fishing_db() end
fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] or {}
-- Get some basic data. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].name = multimatches[1][2] fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].type = multimatches[2][2]
-- Track the room. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms or {} local found_room = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms) do if v == gmcp.Room.Info.num then found_room = true break end end if not found_room then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) end
-- Format the fishing hole contents string so that it can be parsed. multimatches[2][3] = "|" .. multimatches[2][3]:gsub(", ", "||") .. "|" multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub(" and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|%|%|", "||")
-- Iterate over the fishing hole contents and get the fish in the hole. local temp_fish = {} for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|%d+ of ([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do local skip = false for tmp in ftype:gmatch("%d of ") do skip = true break end if not skip then table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end end
-- Make sure our fishing table exists before checking it in the following loop. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish or {} for k, v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if v == "unfamiliar creatures" then table.remove(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, k) break end end
for _, ftype in pairs(temp_fish) do local found = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if ftype == v then found = true break end end if not found then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, ftype) end end
-- Save data. save_fishing_db()
